description: Create a new custom work order status
permissions: User must be an admin or a manager member of the broker organization for the status.
side_effects: Creates a custom work order status record.
validation_notes: --label is required. --primary-status is required and must be one of: editing, ready_for_work, in_progress, on_hold, completed (server enum). --broker is required. color-hex is required by the server and must be a valid hex color (#RGB or #RRGGBB). label must be unique per broker (case-insensitive).

flags.name: --color-hex
flags.validation: Must be a valid hex color (#RGB or #RRGGBB).

flags.name: --primary-status
flags.validation: Must be one of: editing, ready_for_work, in_progress, on_hold, completed.
